entities.name: sir cadogan
entities.description: Sir Cadogan is mentioned as proudly saying 'He had â€˜em!' and showing a piece of paper with passwords written on it. He is described as having the whole week's passwords.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as pulling herself back through the portrait hole to face the stunned crowd and asking who wrote down the passwords.

entities.name: neville longbottom
entities.description: Neville Longbottom is mentioned as trembling from head to fluffy-slippered toes and raising his hand slowly into the air.

relationships.description: Sir Cadogan showed Professor McGonagall a piece of paper with passwords written on it.
Neville Longbottom raised his hand slowly into the air, implying that he was admitting guilt to Professor McGonagall.
